channel.title: ::command

item.title: ::command
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("commands")) { sendQuest("@dre@Joescapecommands", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("Commands", 8146); sendQuest("::MB", 8147); sendQuest("::train", 8148); sendQuest("::spidermini", 8149); sendQuest("::food", 8150); sendQuest("::starter", 8151); sendQuest("", 8152); sendQuest("::1v1,::multi", 8153); sendQuest("Moderator commands", 8154); sendQuest("cmd1", 8155); sendQuest("cmd2", 8156); sendQuest("cmd3", 8157); sendQuest("etc...", 8158); sendQuest("", 8159); sendQuest("", 8160); sendQuest("", 8161); sendQuest("", 8162); sendQuest("", 8163); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }
Just add the text you want in between the “”.

Read full topic

item.title: ::command
item.dc:creator: @2xbladex2 2xbladex2
item.description:
@2xbladex2 wrote:

I want to add commands to the list. But for mods admins and owners. I want it so anybody in the entire server can type ::commands and get their commands. Example: A mod types: ::commands and see normal commands and moderator commands.

Read full topic

item.title: ::command
item.dc:creator: @yur_no_prob yur no prob
item.description:
@yur_no_prob wrote:

Your need a command generator, like the voule one, you probably have one in your tools folder, it helps you design commands, then you post it in the command spot in client.java.

Read full topic

item.title: ::command

item.description:
@yur_no_prob wrote:

You put your commands in Client.Java, and if you need help making commands check around and find a command generator.

item.title: ::command
item.dc:creator: @2xbladex2 2xbladex2
item.description:
@2xbladex2 wrote:

Ok this is what I currently have for ::command

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("commands") && (playerRights >= 0)) { String name = command.substring(5); sendQuest("@dre@Joescapecommands", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("Commands", 8146); sendQuest("::MB", 8147); sendQuest("::train", 8148); sendQuest("::spidermini", 8149); sendQuest("::food", 8150); sendQuest("::starter", 8151); sendQuest("", 8152); sendQuest("::1v1,::multi", 8153); sendQuest("", 8154); sendQuest("", 8155); sendQuest("", 8156); sendQuest("", 8157); sendQuest("", 8158); sendQuest("", 8159); sendQuest("", 8160); sendQuest("", 8161); sendQuest("", 8162); sendQuest("", 8163); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }
Although, I have mod, admin and owner commands I want to add. Can someone post what I would put there?
Copy the current ::command, and add mod, admin, and owner. Make them all have the command ::hi. If you do that I can go on from there.

Read full topic
